products.name: terraform-ibm-secrets-manager-secret-group
products.label: Secrets Manager secret group module
products.short_description: Creates a secret group in an IBM Cloud Secrets Manager instance.
products.long_description:
This module creates a secret group (https://cloud.ibm.com/docs/secrets-manager?topic=secrets-manager-secret-groups) in an IBM Cloud Secrets Manager instance.

## Usage
```hcl
provider "ibm" {
  ibmcloud_api_key = "XXXXXXXXXX"
  region           = "us-south"
}

module "sm-secret-group-module" {
  # Replace "X.X.X" with a release version to lock into a specific release
  source              = "https://cm.globalcatalog.cloud.ibm.com/api/v1-beta/offering/source?archive=tgz&kind=terraform&name=terraform-ibm-secrets-manager-secret-group&version=X.X.X"
  resource_group_id   = "xxXXxxXXxXxXXXXxxXxxxXXXXxXXXXX"
  region              = "us-south"
}
```

features.title: Creates a secret group
features.description: Creates a secret group in an IBM Secrets Manager instance.

diagrams.description: A simple example to create a secret group in an IBM Secrets Manager instance.
